bioAsHtml: Romain has been working on Android at Google since before Android 1.0. He previously lead the Android UI Toolkit team, and the Android Graphics team. He spent years working on the UI toolkit and hardware accelerated rendering pipeline, and is now working on a new UI and graphics related projects.
